name: AS_GCM_ENTRYPOINT_LOGIC_isClauseSetHasValidation
description: The entry point for the LOGIC_isClauseSetHasValidation rule
sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!clauseSetId),
  false,
  a!localVariables(
    local!allClauses: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching(
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
      setId: ri!clauseSetId,
      executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!clauseSetId),
      batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_LARGE,
      showInactive: false(),
      selectionColumns: {
        "relationId",
        "refClause.clauseId",
        "refClause.clauseNumber",
        "refClause.clauseTitle",
        "clauseTitle",
        "retainedClauseTitle",
        "refClause.effectiveDate",
        "effectiveDate",
        "retainedEffectiveDate",
        "refStatus.refDataId",
        "validationAction",
        "isClauseUpdated"
      }
    ),
    local!errorClauses: rule!AS_GCM_UT_checkStatusValidation(clauses: local!allClauses),
    /*Getting only the valid relationIds to query data from the DB*/
    local!relationIdsToQuery: index(
      rule!AS_GCM_UT_clauseVersionValidation(clause: local!allClauses),
      "relationId",
      null()
    ),
    local!activeclauseSetClauses: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching(
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
      relationIds: local!relationIdsToQuery,
      executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!relationIdsToQuery),
      batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_LARGE,
      showInactive: false(),
      onlyGetFieldsForWrite: true(),
      selectAdditionalFieldsForWrite: {
        "refClause.clauseNumber",
        "refClause.clauseTitle",
        "refClause.effectiveDate",
        "refClause.modifiedDatetime"
      }
    ),
    local!updatedClauses: rule!AS_GCM_UT_clauseVersionValidation(clause: local!activeClauseSetClauses),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_not(
      and(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!errorClauses),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!updatedClauses)
      )
    )
  )
)
